description: Lease and Rental of Property or Building
full_summary:
================
# Invitation to Submit an Expression of Interest (EOI)

## Background

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking information from interested parties, including Registered Inuit Firms, to potentially lease space for a period of approximately 10 years, commencing on or about December 1, 2024.

## Request for Information

The lease requirements include:

* Approximately 150 usable square meters (m2) of contiguous warehouse space
* Two energized parking spaces
* A lease term of 10 years, with the space available one week prior to the lease commencement date
* Compliance with PSPC's Standards for Leased Accommodation

The proposed space must meet the following criteria:

* One grade-level overhead door, 2.13 m wide x 2.74 m high
* A man door for pedestrian access
* A minimum unobstructed warehouse ceiling height of 3.05 m throughout
* Heating and basic utilities (telecommunications, water, sewer, gas, and electricity)
* Compatible physical characteristics, including neighboring land uses
* Efficient design and use of the space
* Location in the city of Iqaluit

## Evaluation Criteria

PSPC will evaluate responses based on the space's ability to meet the lease requirements and comply with the specified criteria.

## Submission Instructions

Interested parties should submit an Expression of Interest (EOI) in accordance with the instructions provided in the [attached document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29173/20231211---eoi-81002758-ad-en---in.pdf).

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact Leon Lam at (587) 338-3619 or leon.lam@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca.

## Closing Date

The submission deadline is March 1, 2024, at 2:00 PM (Mountain Time).

## Evaluation Process

PSPC will evaluate responses and notify interested parties of the next steps.
